How to use this application\?
Visiting a poste office can take a lot of time, this is a big waste, time is money after all!
This application will help solve this problem by letting you:
• View current office status
"After selecting a poste office you can immediately see it's current state (is it open, is liquidity available, etc.)\nfor example like this:"
• View current queue status
You can also see the current state of waiting queue (in realtime) this include an estimation of the expected waiting time (if you go to the poste office immediately)\nfor example:
• Get a notification when your turn is close
When you get your ticket from the poste office click the \"ADD TICKET\" button and enter your ticket number, your ticket will be shown like this:
You can configure when you will get notified in the \"ALARMS\" tab, you can even add multiple alarms if you want to get notified multiple times.
• Get an SMS when your turn is close

Generally you will need an internet connection to use this application but if you add your phone number to an alarm we will send you an SMS even if you are offline, please remember that you still need an internet connection when you add your phone number or edit your ticket number.
Why only few poste offices are supported\?

This application is just a simple prototype. We hope that in the future we will integrate this application with companies like \"Algérie Poste\" and \"Algérie Télécom\" to provide more services across the whole country.
How to activate this application\?
Before you can you this application you will need to activate it first, you can learn more about this from here:
For more information, questions or suggestions contact us at:
Before using this application you will need to activate it first, in this page we will explain how to do that. You can also learn more about how to use this application in general from here:
Why you need to activate\?
"This is an ad-free application that is also free to download witch means that (in contrary to most other applications) we don't receive any income from the application itself!"
Instead we sell activation codes.
Instead we sell activation codes, a single activation code cost only %s DA!
Instead we sell activation codes, a single activation code cost only %1$s DA and last for %2$s days!
Where can you buy an activation code\?
You can buy an activation code from our selling points near all the poste offices we support.
To open a map that shows our selling point location do the following:
• From the home page click \"SELECT OFFICE\" button.
• Click \"INFO\" button of the office that you want to visit.
• Click \"MAP\" button to open the map.
How to use an activation code\?
• Open the activation page by clicking on the ⋮ menu then selecting \"ACTIVATE\" item.
• Click \"SCAN\" and put the activation code in front of the camera.
• Write the activate code manually and click \"SUBMIT\".
